title: lol client on macbook wont open
body:
same thing happened yesterday so I had to delete it and download the whole thing again
What should I do now?

replies.body:
Can you confirm you're installing it with the same method listed in our [**Installation Guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202539040-Reinstalling-League-of-Legends#section-mac)?

If so, are you launching League from the taskbar or are you launching it from the applications folder. If the former, I'd recommend trying to launch from the Applications folder. Let me know if anything changed.
